data.eml:eml: Catalogue of hymenopterous insects collected by Mr. A. R. Wallace at the Islands of Aru and Key.

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, F. (1859): Catalogue of hymenopterous insects collected by Mr. A. R. Wallace at the Islands of Aru and Key. Journal of the Proceedings of the Linnean Society of London, Zoology 3: 132-158, URL: http://antbase.org/ants/publications/10342/10342.pdf
